metadata.Title: CVE-2017-13685 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - negligible
metadata.Description:
The dump_callback function in SQLite 3.20.0 allows remote attackers tocause a denial of service (EXC_BAD_ACCESS and application crash) via acrafted file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-13685` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

lemon - 3.22.0-1
libsqlite3-0 - 3.22.0-1
libsqlite3-tcl - 3.22.0-1
sqlite3 - 3.22.0-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: sqlite3 package in esm-infra/bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.22.0-1').
